email.heading: Getting Your Hoodies, T-shirts, and Beanies
email.text:
Hello everyone,
You're receiving this email because you recently purchased a DoCSoc hoodie, T-shirt, or beanie! Congrats! We will be ordering the hoodies and T-shirts very soon, and will send another email when they are ready for collection.
We will offer several collection opportunities in the labs, but if you are still unable to collect then, you can email us with a time and date that works for you and we will do our best to accommodate you.
As a final year student, you are able to customise your hoodie with your name. You may fill in [**this form**](https://goo.gl/forms/XKwVLMvC803EVVwJ2) to inform us of what to print. If you choose not to fill the form or forget, we will not print your name on your hoodie. **Please let us know by midnight on Saturday 20th January.**
You'll hear from us again when we have the hoodies.
